course_description:
This is a test course for use in CI pipelines. This course can be found:

- On Github at  {{% resource_link "843cae84-1330-41a3-a7b9-b0a6cab1f45c" "https://github.mit.edu/ocw-content-rc/ocw-ci-test-course" %}}
- On OCW Studio at {{% resource_link "014e4c96-cc02-4121-b0fa-81a73cca36dc" "https://ocw-studio-rc.odl.mit.edu/sites/ocw-ci-test-course" %}}

The content of this course is additionally checked into the `ocw-hugo-themes` repository.

 Recommended usage by OL Engineers:

- Clone the github repository to your local.
- When developing on `ocw-hugo-themes`, make edits in Studio as needed for the tests you want to write. Pull to local, and copy the files to `ocw-hugo-themes/test-sites/ocw-ci-test-course`.
course_description_html:
This is a test course for use in CI pipelines. This course can be found:

  • On Github at  https://github.mit.edu/ocw-content-rc/ocw-ci-test-course
  • On OCW Studio at https://ocw-studio-rc.odl.mit.edu/sites/ocw-ci-test-course

The content of this course is additionally checked into the ocw-hugo-themes repository.

 Recommended usage by OL Engineers:

  • Clone the github repository to your local.
  • When developing on ocw-hugo-themes, make edits in Studio as needed for the tests you want to write. Pull to local, and copy the files to ocw-hugo-themes/test-sites/ocw-ci-test-course.
